Sentencas: Widespread use of solid oxide electrolyzer and fuel cells is hindered by a lack of long-term durability of seals caused by thermal expansion mismatch induced cracking.
Titulo: Shape memory alloy/glass composite seal for solid oxide electrolyzer and fuel cells

Sentencas: A novel seal design incorporating an engineered thermal expansion gradient in a glass matrix with a TiNiHf shape memory alloy mesh for active stress relief and crack healing is being developed.
Titulo: Shape memory alloy/glass composite seal for solid oxide electrolyzer and fuel cells

Sentencas: Thermal expansion coefficient (CTE) measurements of the seal and other cell components show the possibility of a thermal expansion gradient design for the seal.
Titulo: Shape memory alloy/glass composite seal for solid oxide electrolyzer and fuel cells

Sentencas: Differential scanning calorimetry and microscopy show that the TiNiHf alloy has shape memory phase transformation temperatures in the desired range of 200-250 degrees C.
Titulo: Shape memory alloy/glass composite seal for solid oxide electrolyzer and fuel cells

Sentencas: The glass partially crystallizes during thermal cycling, as shown by X-ray diffraction and dilatometry; the CTE decreases from 9.3 X 10(-6) to 6.6 x 10(-6)degrees C-1 after thermal cycling.
Titulo: Shape memory alloy/glass composite seal for solid oxide electrolyzer and fuel cells

Sentencas: Neutron diffraction data from TiNiHf/glass composite reveal that the TiNiHf alloy absorbs residual stresses from the glass matrix during austenitic to martensitic phase transformation.
Titulo: Shape memory alloy/glass composite seal for solid oxide electrolyzer and fuel cells
